courseInfo: Python is a high-level, general-purpose programming language. Its design philosophy emphasizes code readability with the use of significant indentation.

courseInfo: Digital marketing is the component of marketing that uses the Internet and online based digital technologies such as desktop computers, mobile phones and other digital media and platforms to promote products and services
